column1: Traffic Reports will resume Monday, July 19 at 6:30am.
** Rosemont Garden at Clays Mill Road - Major Lane Closure starting MONDAY, JULY 19 from 9AM until 6PM
** and continuing 6AM to 9PM TUESDAY and subsequent days.  Work should take two to four days to complete depending on conditions.
** Rosement Garden will be limited to only allow one lane eastbound (away from Southland)
** This closure will allow Columbia Gas to install a new gas line under the roadway
** We apologize for any inconvenience. The daytime closure and extending hours are necessary due to the amount of anticipated rock,
** and also necessary to remain on schedule for the completion of the Clays Mill Road Widening Project
** A detour via Reed Lane and Lafayette Parkway will be signed, but motorists should void the area if at all possible.
